abstracts.cdata!:
The Rural Land Titling and Cadastre
            Development Project for Ukraine will establish a national
            cadastre and title registry system, allocate land parcels to
            individuals in rural areas on an equitable basis, establish
            their property rights by issuing state deeds for land, and
            encourage the restructuring of farms into more efficient
            units. The changes are made to cancel the sum of
            US$11,850,000 from savings. The project is at moderately
            satisfactory status. It is progressing towards meeting the
            development objective within the time frame of the project
            and is expected to meet all targets before the end of the
            project period. The progress with completing large mapping
            contracts that are required in order to produce cadastral
            index maps is behind schedule and for this reason the
            project is classified as only moderately satisfactory.
